titles.title: My faith has found a resting place

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1 v4 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: My faith has found a resting place, Not in device nor creed; I trust the Ever-living One, His wounds for me shall plead.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: I need no other argument, I need no other plea; It is enough that Jesus died, And that He died for me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Enough for me that Jesus saves, This ends my fear and doubt; A sinful soul I come to Him, He’ll never cast me out.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: My heart is leaning on the Word, The written Word of God, Salvation by my Savior’s name, Salvation through His blood.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: My great Physician heals the sick, The lost He came to save; For me His precious blood He shed, For me His life He gave.
